relation: Winter month with balmy breeze and clear blue sky. The most pleasant time for exploring all through the city and its outskirts. The weather is completely favorable to enjoy sightseeing, outings and outdoor activities in Mumbai.

February has pleasant bright days with mild cold nights. It is one of the best months for tourist visits. Sightseeing, family outings and other tourist related activities can be best enjoyed in this period.

Summer begins in March accompanying sunny warm days followed by pleasant evenings. The temperature and humidity level rises gradually but still in the comfortable hot zone. The moderate weather makes it ideal for tourist visits and exploring attractions in Mumbai. Outings and outdoor trips can also be done.

April offers bright summer days with high level of humidity. However, the cool sea breeze offers some relief in the evening. Due to hot and humid climate, this month is considered as not the best season for tourist visits. If you are visiting in summer days then cotton clothes and sun protective things are preferable.

It is the hottest month of the year. Days are hot and humid while the cooling effect of the sea breezes offers some pleasant atmosphere in the evenings. The period is not suitable for exploring the city of Mumbai. Cotton wears and sun protecting stuffs are recommended for traveling in summer.

Beautiful monsoon appears in June. The month accompanies lots of rainfalls with high level of humidity. It may not be the best season for tourist activities in Mumbai. Even most people avoid visiting the place in monsoon but those who like rains/rain lovers can still enjoy their visit.

Maximum rainfalls occur in July making it the wettest month of the year. Constant rainfall often causes flood in the city and normal lives get disorganized. It may not be a good idea to visit the city in rainy days. If you still like to pay a visit during monsoon then carrying proper rain gear is a must.

Monsoon shower hits the city with all its majesty. Temperature drops down to a certain level but humidity level remains high which makes a bit uncomfortable while traveling. This time is recommended to rain lovers and those who like monsoon effect. But outdoor activities can be difficult in rainy season.
Monsoon shower lasts till this month and rainfall occurs infrequently. This post monsoon season is like the beginning of summer. The biggest festival Ganesh Chatturthi is celebrated in this month.

October offers sunny days with clear sky; it can be termed as the second summer month after monsoon. Days are moderately hot and humid while nights are pleasant. It is the beginning of the tourist season. The temperate climate makes it comfortable for sightseeing and outdoor activities.

Temperature and humidity drops down to a pleasant level making it suitable for all sorts of tourist activities. Days and nights are equally pleasant in this month. It is one of the best seasons for tourists to enjoy sightseeing, outings and other tourist activities in Mumbai.

Winter season begins, accompanying pleasant climate with cool breeze. The humidity level becomes low during December. The dry and pleasing atmosphere invites many travelers to the city. The season is perfect for sightseeing and enjoying a great time in this vibrant city.
